# Overnight oats {#oats .unnumbered}

**Ingredients:**  
1/2 cup oatmeal (regular, not quick cooking or steel cut)  
1 cup oat milk or other liquid (other milk or water also works)  
1 tablespoon chia seeds (or flax seeds, or other healthy add-ins)  
a handful of raisins and/or other dried fruit  
a pinch of salt  
optional add-ins include berries, sliced banana, nuts, almond butter, etc.

**Steps:**  
1. Combine oatmeal, liquid, chia seeds, raisins, and salt in a bowl. Cover, and refrigerate for at least 5 hours, and up to 5 days.   
2. Remove from fridge and stir in optional add-ins.
